Bearer.description:
For accessing the protected API resources, you must have received a valid token after registering or logging in. This JWT token must then be used for all protected resources by passing it in via the 'Authorization' header.

A JWT token is generated by the API by either registering via /users or logging in via /users/login. The following format must be in the 'Authorization' header :

 Token: xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz
Bearer.name: Authorization

get.description: Get all agents that belong to a specific team. Returns only agents directly owned by the team (no subteam agents).

parameters.name: deployedOnly
parameters.description: If true, returns only agents that have at least one deployment

200.description: List of agents belonging to the team

deployed.description: Indicates if the agent has any deployments

total.description: Total number of agents matching the query
